Title text for multi-value insulin sensitivity warning

trans-unit.id: Insulin sensitivity describes how your blood glucose should respond to a 1 Unit dose of insulin. Smaller values mean more insulin will be given when above target. Values that are too small can cause dangerously low blood glucose.
trans-unit.source: Insulin sensitivity describes how your blood glucose should respond to a 1 Unit dose of insulin. Smaller values mean more insulin will be given when above target. Values that are too small can cause dangerously low blood glucose.
trans-unit.target: La sensibilit√† all‚Äôinsulina descrive il modo in cui la tua glicemia dovrebbe rispondere a una dose di insulina pari a 1 Unit√†. In caso di valori inferiori, al superamento del target verr√† somministrata pi√π insulina. Valori troppo bassi possono causare livelli di glicemia pericolosamente bassi.
trans-unit.note: The description shown on the insulin sensitivity schedule interface.

trans-unit.id:
%@ has been unable to communicate with the Simulator Pump since %@.
Without communication, the app cannot continue to send commands for insulin delivery or display accurate, recent information about your active insulin or the insulin being delivered.
